help.label: Show help for documentation toggle.
help.content: Enable to show the documentation and disable to hide the documentation.

help.label: Show help for dark mode toggle.
help.content: Enable to set theme to dark mode and disable to set theme to light mode.

help.label: Show help for include current program toggle.
help.content: Enable to include your program when flashing the firmware or disable to use the default program. Flashing your program along with the firmware will allow you to run your program without being connected to {appName}

help.label: Show help on hub name input
help.content: Enter a name here to customize the hub name when flashing the firmware. This name will be used in the Bluetooth advertising data and can be used to identify the hub when connecting.
